{{- $alt := .alt -}} {{- if not $alt -}} {{- $alt = .src | replaceRE `^http.+/(.*)$` `$1` | replaceRE `^(.+)\..*$` `$1` | humanize -}} {{- end -}} {{- $lazy := cond (not .notlazy) "lazy" "" -}} {{- $iframe_data := "" -}} {{- $iframe_name := "" -}} {{- $iframe_src := "" -}} {{- with .iframe -}} {{- $iframe_data = true -}} {{- $iframe_name = print "data-" .name -}} {{- $iframe_src = .src -}} {{- end -}} {{- $pic_attrs := dict "class" .class "data-iframe" $iframe_data $iframe_name $iframe_src -}} {{- $img_attrs := dict "src" (.src | safeURL) "alt" $alt "decoding" "async" "loading" $lazy -}} {{- $pic_attrs = partial "functions/attrs" $pic_attrs -}} {{- $img_attrs = partial "functions/attrs" $img_attrs -}} {{- /* HTML */}} {{- /* icon */ -}} {{- with .icon_play }} {{ . -}} {{- end -}} {{- /* schema */}} {{ if not .notschema -}} {{- with .iframe -}} {{- partial "components/base/schema/video" (dict "name" $alt "thumbnailUrl" $.src "uploadDate" .upload "duration" .duration "contentUrl" .url "embedUrl" .src ) -}} {{- else -}} {{- partial "components/base/schema/image" (dict "url" .src "width" 512 "height" 512 "caption" $alt ) -}} {{- end -}} {{- end -}}
